definition: depth (from front to rear)/depth (into a territory)/span (of time)/(fig.) depth (of deployment, progress, development etc)
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if

sentences.english: This flitting cheerfulness was always at the farther extremity of some long vista through the forest.
sentences.chinese: 这种转瞬即逝的欢悦总是出现在森林纵深处。

sentences.english: The principle proponent of the Deep Operations theory, Marshal of the Soviet Union, Mikhail Tukhachevsky.
sentences.chinese: 大纵深战略理论的倡导者，苏联元帅，图哈切夫斯基。

sentences.english: In the West, Union armies were slowly pushing deeper into Confederate territory.
sentences.chinese: 在西部，北方军已经慢慢地推进到南方的纵深。

sentences.english: The chest is rather deep, of moderate breadth, with reasonable spring of rib.
sentences.chinese: 胸部宜纵深，宽度相当，肋骨韧度适当。

sentences.english: They look into the beauty of thy mind.
sentences.chinese: 触向你心神之纵深处张望。

sentences.english: In some places the water reached nine-and-a-half kilometers inland.
sentences.chinese: 有些内陆地区，积水纵深长达九公里半。

sentences.english: This lighting will also add depth to your portrait.
sentences.chinese: 这种光线还会加深你肖像的纵深感。

sentences.english: The Chinese side is willing to make joint efforts to deepen the China-Kyrgystan relations.
sentences.chinese: 我们愿与吉方共同努力，使中吉关系不断向纵深发展。

sentences.english: We must profoundly look into history to interpret Dali Zhang's paintings.
sentences.chinese: 解读张大力的油画作品，必须从历史的纵深中找寻。

sentences.english: One of the fundamental tenets of nuclear power plant design is “Defense in Depth.
sentences.chinese: 设计核电厂有一个基本准则叫“纵深防御”。

sentences.english: There's a layering, a feeling of successive targets being deeper inside.
sentences.chinese: 这里有一个层概念，连续的目标会纵深向里面排列。
所谓战略纵深也就这么多。

sentences.english: The chest is rather deep and of moderate breadth.
sentences.chinese: 胸部宜纵深，且宽度适当。
因此，网络纵深防御，势在必行。

sentences.english: When it comes to safety, the nuclear industry emphasizes the concept of "defense in depth.
sentences.chinese: 谈到安全问题，核工业界强调“纵深防御”的概念。

sentences.english: You can move them parallel to each other to give the feeling of depth.
sentences.chinese: 你可以移动它们，使它们相互平行，以制造纵深感。
